TopicTitle: So I was looking at KSP in the Steam store...

Articles.Content:
And found out that squad has some outdated screenshots me thinks...


Speed...Altitude....
They gonna die! XD
It's been a while, but I seem to recall they had a screenshot showing parts from 0.16 or earlier either on the store or on Steam. They may be gone now, however.
Yeah... They seem to be neglecting their steam page XD
But at least it is 40% off right now.
